PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01542021-03-17,  AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  , 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS (HAR) in order to (1) repeal Schedule III of the HAR and include an ambulatory reference to a list of susceptible species of aquatic animals to align with the World Organisation for Animal Health Aquatic Animal Health Code; (2) remove seven and add twelve susceptible species of aquatic animals.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0041 Publication Date: 2021-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS (HAR) in order to (1) repeal Schedule III of the HAR and include an ambulatory reference to a list of susceptible species of aquatic animals to align with the World Organisation for Animal Health Aquatic Animal Health Code; (2) remove seven and add twelve susceptible species of aquatic animals.
